data.eml:eml: Taxonomy of the genus Pristidia Deeleman-Reinhold, 2001 (Araneae: Clubionidae) in China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yu, Hao, Zhang, Jianshuang, Chen, Jian (2017): Taxonomy of the genus Pristidia Deeleman-Reinhold, 2001 (Araneae: Clubionidae) in China. Zootaxa 4306 (3): 411-418, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4306.3.7
